name: Spider Cave (ElenaroArmero)
description:
This is my 3D Platformer  project.

I made the following changes:

  1. Created two different levels. 
  2. Changed the model and animations of the player's character, as well as enemies.
  3. Added the ability to zoom in and out of the camera. As well as a sword attack.
  4. Made a new main menu, as well as in-game menus.
  5. Changed the music in the game and most of the sounds.
  6. Reworked UI elements.

Credits:

Created by Elenaro Armero (Oleg Dergunov).
